title: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When retrieving datetime values from a table, the format displayed in a dynamic text item and a data/text item is different.
EB: The datetime values retrieved from the table should be displayed in the same format in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Insert a text, data, and dynamic text item.
2. Retrieve datetime values from a table and display them in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
